actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 3443 in lieu of this measure.

official_title: A bill to designate the Closed Basin Conveyance Channel of the Closed Basin Division, San Luis Valley Project, Colorado as the "Franklin Eddy Canal".

summary.text: Designates the Closed Basin Conveyance Channel of the San Luis Valley Project, Colorado, as the Franklin Eddy Canal.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Closed Basin Conveyance Channel of the Closed Basin Division, San Luis Valley Project, Colorado as the "Franklin Eddy Canal".
